on DUPLICATE key update tel=VALUES(tel),intergral=VALUES(intergral),code=values(code),name=values(name),hxzhuangtai=2
mapper.select: select count(vipid) as count from HX_vipcards where tel <> '' and intergral>0 and companyId= #{company,jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT count(vipid) as count from HX_vipcards where intergral >=0 and tel <>'' and (intergral-ptjfen) >0 and companyId= #{company,jdbcType=INTEGER} and ddzhuangtai=2 and hxzhuangtai=2

SELECT vipid, tel ,intergral,ptjfen, (intergral-ptjfen) as jf from HX_vipcards where intergral >=0 and tel <>'' and (intergral-ptjfen) >0 and companyId= #{company,jdbcType=INTEGER} and ddzhuangtai=2 and hxzhuangtai=2 limit #{start,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{end,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT vipid, name, tel ,intergral,ptjfen, (intergral-ptjfen) as jf from HX_vipcards where intergral >=0 and tel <>'' and (intergral-ptjfen) < 0 and companyid =#{companyId} and ddzhuangtai=2 and hxzhuangtai=2 ORDER BY tel
